SELECT daoxin_erp_stock_details.sku_id as skuId, daoxin_erp_stock_details.inkind_id as inkindId, daoxin_erp_stock_details.number as num, goods_sku.spu_id as spuId, goods_spu.spu_classification_id as spuClassificationId, goods_inkind.anomaly as anomaly, daoxin_erp_stock_details.number as number FROM daoxin_erp_stock_details LEFT JOIN goods_sku ON goods_sku.sku_id = daoxin_erp_stock_details.sku_id LEFT JOIN goods_spu ON goods_sku.spu_id = goods_spu.spu_id LEFT JOIN goods_inkind on daoxin_erp_stock_details.inkind_id = goods_inkind.inkind_id
WHERE daoxin_erp_stock_details.number > 0 and daoxin_erp_stock_details.display = 1

WHERE display = 1 and stage = 1 GROUP BY sku_id, brand_id
